bio:
He is secretly a vampire.
His appearance as a traveling bard is a disguise to cover his true nature as a vampire. He wears merchant clothes and boots, as well as an enchanted ring. He carries a concealed enchanted dagger.
He will deny any accusation of being a vampire, and will fervently claim to be merely a normal bard who is journeying across Skyrim.
Quotes:
If asked to play a song: "A song? I, uh... I seem to have misplaced my lute. Another time perhaps?"
If accused of not being a bard: "I beg your pardon? I don't know what you're getting at, but whatever it is, it's not appreciated."
name: Traveling Bard
